channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Ein Byd Bach...
channel.desc: Awn n?l mewn hanes i ddarganfod pa fath o beiriannau sydd wedi cael dylanwad mawr ar ein bywydau ni, fel y wasg argraffu. We look at all sorts of machines, from JCB's to Cranes.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Patrol Pawennau
channel.desc: Pan mae Porth yr Haul yn cael Olwyn Fawr newydd, mae Maer Campus yn eiddigeddus dros ben. When Porth yr Haul gets a new Big Wheel, Mayor Campus is very, very jealous.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Fferm Fach
channel.desc: Mae Nel eisiau gwybod o ble mae blawd yn dod. Felly, mae Hywel y ffermwr hud yn mynd ? hi i Fferm Fach i ddangos hud ffermio go iawn iddi. Nel wants to know where Flour comes from.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Dreigiau
channel.desc: Pan ddarganfyddir bod ffynnon y dref yn sych, mae Igion yn ymchwilio i'r mater. Igion discovers the town's water shortage has been caused by a plan to hide young dragons under Berc.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Prosiect Z
channel.desc: Yn dilyn arbrawf trychinebus, mae pobl yn dechrau troi'n Zombies. A fydd disgyblion Ysgol y Creuddyn yn gallu eu trechu? New series. Can youngsters from Ysgol y Creuddyn beat the Zombies.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Newyddion Ni
channel.desc: Newyddion i bobl ifanc. News programmes for youngsters.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Heno
channel.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Newyddion S4C
channel.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Croeso i Eisteddfod yr Urdd
channel.desc: Sarra Elgan sy'n edrych ymlaen at Eisteddfod yr Urdd 'Dur a M?r' 2025 ym Mharc Margam, Port Talbot. Sarra Elgan guides us through what's in store at 2025's Eisteddfod yr Urdd at Margam Park.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Newyddion S4C
channel.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Curadur
channel.desc: Prif leisydd Taran, band o Gaerdydd, sy'n curadu. Rose Datta sy'n edrych ar ei phrofiadau hi ac eraill o fod mewn band ifanc, newydd. The lead singer of the band Taran curates this episode.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Y Llinell Las
channel.desc: Mae'r Criw Uned Troseddau'r Ffyrdd - Dan, Arwel & Chris - ar drywydd gyrrwyr sy'n yfed; tra bod Gethin o'r Uned Cwn yn cadw'n cwl. This time, the Road Crime Unit Crew trail drink drivers.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Der' Dramor 'Da Fi!
channel.desc: Ma' pedwar person sydd erioed wedi cwrdd yn teithio dramor i Wlad Belg i gystadlu i drefnu y 'daytrip' orau. Four strangers travel to Belgium and go head to head in a daytrip competition.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: ..programmes start at 6.00am
channel.desc: programmes start at 6.00am.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Teleshopping
channel.desc: Home Shopping.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: ..programmes start at 6.00am
channel.desc: programmes start at 6.00am.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Guto Gwningen
channel.desc: Mae Guto'n dod o hyd i allwedd wedi ei chuddio yn llyfr mawr pwysig ei dad. Guto finds a mysterious key hidden in his father's journal and is determined to find out what it fits.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Bendibwmbwls
channel.desc: Mae Ben Dant ar antur newydd i ailgylchu a throi sbwriel yn sbeshal, a gwastraff yn gampwaith. Today, Ben Dant will be joining pupils at Ysgol Y Traeth to create excellent treasure.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Sam Tan
channel.desc: Mae'n ddiwrnod sioe Arddangos Llysiau Gorau Pontypandy. Mae'r plant wedi tyfu pwmpen enfawr ond mae Jams a hi yn cael antur a hanner! It's the day of Pontypandy's Best Vegetable Show.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc
channel.desc: Ymunwch ? Kim a Cai ar antur hudolus a chwareus sy'n llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am gragen newydd i Cranc! Join Kim and Cai on a magical and playful adventure.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Pablo
channel.desc: Mae gan Pablo ei ffordd ei hun o weld y byd, a phan mae o'n hapus mae o'n hoffi fflapio ei freichiau. Palo flaps so much that he flies away and the Book Animals have to track him down.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Olobobs
channel.desc: Mae Tib, Lalw a Bobl yn ymweld ? Hen Gloc y Goedwig - y peth hynaf yn y goedwig, nd mae wedi stopio. Tib, Lalloo and Bobble visit the Old Forest Clock - the oldest thing in the forest.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
channel.desc: Mae Gwiber yn creu trafferth glan yr afon er mwyn cael bwyta tarten afal taffi Dan i gyd. Gwiber sets one riverbanker against the other in order to seize all of Dan's toffee apple pie.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Dreigiau Cadi
channel.desc: Pan aiff Cadi ar goll, mae angen i'r dreigiau ei hachub. When Cadi goes missing, it's up to the dragons to come to her rescue.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
channel.desc: Daw Pero i chwilio am gymorth gan fod Talfryn wedi torri ei fys. Pero seeks help when Talfryn has a broken finger, so Blero and his friends save the day and discover bones are amazing.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Deian a Loli
channel.desc: Mae Mam eisiau taflu Terariwm Dad, ond ma'r efeilliaid yn benderfynol o achub y byd bach. Mum wants to throw away Dad's Terrarium, but the twins are determined to save the little habitat.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Stwnsh Sadwrn Byw
channel.desc: Jack, Leah, Lloyd, Jed a Cadi sy' yn y stiwdio, gyda llond lle o gemau, LOL-ian ac ambell pei Stwnsh! Jack, Leah, Lloyd, Jed and Cadi are in the studio with games and the odd Stwnsh pie.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Annibendod
channel.desc: Mae Anni a Cai'n penderfynu chwarae cuddio. Ond mae Cai a Bochau'n methu dod o hyd i Anni, ydy hi'n creu annibendod yn rhywle? Anni and Cai decide to play hide and seek, but there's chaos.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Ein Llwybrau Celtaidd
channel.desc: Tro ma, awn i Wicklow, Chill Mhant?in i ddechrau, ac yn ail ran y bennod, daw'r teulu n?l i'w cartre cyntaf yma yng Nghymru a glanio yn Sir Benfro. This time: Wicklow and Pembrokeshire.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Ceffylau, Sheikhs a Chowbois
channel.desc: Mae Emrys a Sue yn teithio i Scottsdale, Arizona ar antur i brynu ceffylau i rai o'u cleientiaid cyfoethog. The pair travel to Scottsdale, Arizona for the world's largest Arabian horse show.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Ffermio
channel.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn am faterion cefn gwlad. Weekly countryside and farming magazine.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Cais Quinnell
channel.desc: Scott Quinnell sy'n ymarfer ei Gymraeg wrth deithio Cymru a chael llond bol o hwyl. This week Scott will be sea foraging, enjoying a 'gong bath' and having a drag masterclass.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Siwrna Scandi Chris
channel.desc: Pennod olaf. Mae Chris yn profi danteithion Copenhagen yn Denmarc. Last episode, and Chris heads to Copenhagen to sample the culinary delights of Denmark.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Clwb Rygbi
channel.desc: Gemau rygbi byw. Live rugby games.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Rygbi Cymru yn Ewrop 30
channel.desc: This is S4C.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: 3 Lle
channel.desc: Cyfle arall i weld Aled Si?n Davies yn dewis ei dri hoff le. Another chance to see Paralympic athlete Aled Si?n Davies visiting three favourite places.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Newyddion a Chwaraeon
channel.desc: Newyddion a chwaraeon y penwythnos. Weekend news and sport.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Cysgu o Gwmpas
channel.desc: Sir Benfro yw'r stop nesaf i Beti a Huw, ac hynny yng ngwesty'r Grove yn Narberth. This time, the duo enjoy a feast from soil to plate at the Grove Hotel in Narberth.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Aur y Noson Lawen
channel.desc: Ifan Jones Evans sy'n pori trwy hanes un o'n rhaglenni teledu adloniant mwyaf poblogaidd. Join Ifan Jones Evans as he dips into the archives of one of Wales' best-loved TV shows.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Eisteddfod '24 Llwyfan y Maes
channel.desc: Cyngerdd byw arbennig gan Eden yn Eisteddfod Genedlaethol Rhondda Cynon Taf 2024. A special live concert by Eden at the Rhondda Cynon Taf National Eisteddfod 2024.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Yn y Lwp
channel.desc: Y DJ a cyflwynydd, Molly Palmer, sydd yn ein tywys drwy gynnwys cerddorol diweddar Lwp. DJ and presenter, Molly Palmer, guides us through Lwp's recent musical content.
